text: The random number generator random.org (http://www.random.org) created the allocation sequence. Numbers 1 to 209, to give 20% redundancy over the 174 calculated sample size, were arranged in random sequence without restriction or stratification. Allocations to groups ''A'' and ''B'' were placed in sealed opaque sequentially numbered envelopes and stored in the operating suite.
sentences: The random number generator random.org (http://www.random.org) created the allocation sequence.
Numbers 1 to 209, to give 20% redundancy over the 174 calculated sample size, were arranged in random sequence without restriction or stratification.
Allocations to groups ''A'' and ''B'' were placed in sealed opaque sequentially numbered envelopes and stored in the operating suite.
